lines:
1903

17 March, 1919.

Mr. Bung Sing Kran

536 Commonwealth Ave.

Boston, Mass.

My door klan:

I have your letter of March 16th enclosing the list of guests

to be invited to the coming tea.

Cards will be sent out very shortly.

The change of date is all right, too.

The two you have mentioned for the automobile transfer seems 
to me alton et for too high. If you do not find something much more reason -
able let me know, and I vill see if anything can be done to bet ar advantage

at this end.

on the invitations that are sent out I will follow your suggest -
ton and ask that rapid 9 be sent. This is a coupon practicesand is done 
in order that those who plan to entertain may now how many guests to pro -
side for. In this way we ought to be able to toll in advance how many and 
Just who are to be present.

I will take up with Miss Clemong your suggestion about asking the 
guests to meet lips. Hall. It seems to me to be an o11ct idea. 
Come to see me Sunday if you possibly can.

Faithfully yours,
raw: 1903  17 March, 1919.  Mr. Bung Sing Kran  536 Commonwealth Ave.  Boston, Mass.  My door klan:  I have your letter of March 16th enclosing the list of guests  to be invited to the coming tea.  Cards will be sent out very shortly.  The change of date is all right, too.  The two you have mentioned for the automobile transfer seems  to me alton et for too high. If you do not find something much more reasonable let me know, and I vill see if anything can be done to bet ar advantage  at this end.  on the invitations that are sent out I will follow your suggestton and ask that rapid 9 be sent. This is a coupon practicesand is done  in order that those who plan to entertain may now how many guests to proside for. In this way we ought to be able to toll in advance how many and  Just who are to be present.  I will take up with Miss Clemong your suggestion about asking the  guests to meet lips. Hall. It seems to me to be an o11ct idea.  Come to see me Sunday if you possibly can.  Faithfully yours,

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter with list of guests for upcoming tea, confirming change of date, requesting a lower price for the automobile transfer, and offering to ask Miss Clemons if the guests might meet Mrs. Hall.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
